name: HeyDisneyAmagicalvoiceassistantforAlexa
0:
caret
”Alexa, introduce me to Hey Disney!”
”Hey Disney! Start the magic.”
”Hey Disney! What can you do?”
skdetail:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
des:
Bring the magic of Disney home with the Hey Disney! voice assistant. Enjoy Storybooks, Soundscapes, games, and Disney fun combined with everyday features like weather, alarms, timers, and more—all with a sprinkle of pixie dust. Just say “Alexa, introduce me to Hey Disney!”

You can listen to Soundscapes to transport into magical worlds, discover new favorite stories, play Disney Trivia, and go on Play-Along Adventures. The Disney Magical Companion has its own unique voice and is a great addition to your Alexa experience—Alexa will still help to play music, stream videos, and more. Here are some of the great things to try from the new world of the Hey Disney! voice assistant: 

Try saying: 

• “Hey Disney! Start the magic.” - Learn about all the wonderful things Hey Disney! can do. You can always come back to this anytime or simply ask “Hey Disney!, what can you do?”

• "Hey Disney! Tell me a story." - Explore 140 tales of far-off places with Storybooks. Choose from favorite stories like The Lion King, Frozen, Moana, and many more. 

• “Hey Disney! Play Soundscapes." - Transform your room with sounds and music from the worlds of Star Wars, Frozen, Guardians of the Galaxy, Coco, and many more. 

• "Hey Disney! Let's play Trivia." - Test your knowledge with over 300 questions about Disney parks, characters, movies, and history in exciting rounds hosted by the Hey Disney! voice assistant. 

• “Hey Disney! Start a timer.” - Add more magic to everyday Alexa features with the unique sound of the Hey Disney! voice assistant. 


Frequently Asked Questions:

How does Hey Disney! work, and how do I get it on my Echo device? 
Hey Disney! is an annual subscription only available in the US. It’s available for purchase in the Alexa Skills Store and works on compatible Echo devices. Hey Disney! is also included with Amazon Kids+, a digital subscription for kids with thousands of books, games, Alexa Skills, and more. 

To set up Hey Disney! on a compatible Echo device, just say, "Alexa, introduce me to Hey Disney!" Once purchased and the experience is enabled, you can say "Hey Disney! Start the magic," for an introduction.

What devices support the Hey Disney! experience? 
Hey Disney! works with most voice-activated Echo devices in your home. Echo Show 15 now supports Hey Disney! by voice, but touch is not supported for Trivia and Play-Along Adventures. Hey Disney! does not currently work on 1st gen Echo, On-the-Go devices, Echo Frames, Fire TV, and Fire Tablets.

What is the ‘Disney Magical Companion’ and how many characters does Hey Disney! feature? 
Just as customers know and are familiar with the voice of Alexa, Hey Disney! has its own unique voice and personality that Disney calls the ‘Disney Magical Companion.’ While customers cannot choose the voice of a specific character, Disney Magical Companion acts as the party host, and depending on the request, will accompany you on an experience with over 20 iconic characters across Disney, Pixar, Star Wars, and other beloved franchises to make the responses magical and fun. 

What specific questions or phrases make Hey Disney! work? 
After purchase with the experience enabled, customers can say "Hey Disney!" wake word to ask for weather, timers, or alarms, stories, soundscapes, and games. Customers can also ask, "Hey Disney!, what can you do?" at any time to get recommendations on what experiences to try.
